content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(x=-40.5 y=40.5)
Consists of steam engine(position x=-40.5 y=40.5) which is not connected to the power network.

### Boiler system at position(x=1.5 y=1.0)
Consists of boiler(position x=1.5 y=1.0) and boiler(position x=1.5 y=3.0) connected by pipes.

### Offshore pump system at position(x=-7.5 y=25.5)
Consists of offshore pump(position x=-7.5 y=25.5), offshore pump(position x=-18.5 y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-16.5 y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-13.5 y=26.5), offshore pump(position x=-3.5 y=27.5), offshore pump(position x=-1.5 y=28.5), offshore pump(position x=0.5 y=30.5), and offshore pump(position x=1.5 y=32.5) connected by pipes.

### Pipe network
Consists of multiple pipe groups including:
- Pipe group at position x=-5.5 y=-8.5 with status EntityStatus.WORKING
- Pipe group at position x=3.5 y=-2.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=-20.5 y=25.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=-13.5 y=25.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=-5.5 y=25.5 with status EntityStatus.EMPTY
- Pipe group at position x=-19.5 y=27.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=1.5 y=30.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=2.5 y=32.5 with status EntityStatus.FULL_OUTPUT
- Pipe group at position x=-40.5 y=37.5 with status EntityStatus.EMPTY

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when using boilers
- Ensure that the boiler has sufficient fuel to operate.
- Check the connection of the boiler to the power network.

### Errors when using offshore pumps
- Ensure that the offshore pump is properly connected to the pipe network.
- Check the fluid box of the offshore pump for any issues.

### Errors when using steam engines
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to the power network.
- Check the input liquid and fluid connections of the steam engine.

### Errors when using pipe groups
- Ensure that the pipe group is properly connected to the fluid system.
- Check the status of the pipe group for any issues.

### Errors when using electricity groups
- Ensure that the electricity group is properly connected to the power network.
- Check the voltage of the electricity group for any issues.
